title: Plate
text: This plate descended in the family of John Corlis and Susan Conde Russell Corlis of Rhode Island.  Around 1800, John Corlis bought his deceased father-in-law's home. A parlor from the house was installed in the Minneapolis Institute of Arts in 1924 and is identified today as the Providence Room.
description: blue and white; small container of flowers with a ribbon underneath at center; gilt details at rim and center
